languages.text: {n}Окинув взглядом ближайшие клетки, Ирлиэт озадаченно хмурится.{/n} "Мне известно, что твои сородичи трепещут от одного упоминания чужаков-с-далеких-звезд, элантах. Но что же это — своеобразный ритуал охранения, когда мон-кай преображаются в чудовищ из своих кошмаров, чтобы крепче спать по ночам?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Окинув взглядом ближайшие клетки, Ирлиэт озадаченно хмурится.{/n} "Мне известно, что твои сородичи трепещут от одного упоминания чужаков-с-далеких-звезд, эл'антар. Но что же это — своеобразный ритуал охранения, когда мон-кай преображаются в чудовищ из своих кошмаров, чтобы крепче спать по ночам?"

languages.text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"
languages.original_text: {n}Окинув взглядом ближайшие клетки, Ирлиэт озадаченно хмурится.{/n} "Мне известно, что твои сородичи трепещут от одного упоминания чужаков-с-далеких-звезд, элантах. Но что же это — своеобразный ритуал охранения, когда мон-кай преображаются в чудовищ из своих кошмаров, чтобы крепче спать по ночам?"

But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

languages.text: {n}一番近くの檻に目をやったユリエットは不思議そうな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「エランタよ、お前たちの一族は遠い星のよそ者について話をするだけで震え上がるはず。なのにこれはなんだ？モン＝ケイが悪夢に出てくる生物の姿をまねることで夜も安心して眠れるようにする、身を守るまじないみたいなものか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一番近くの檻に目をやったユリエットは不思議そうな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「エランタよ、お前たちの一族は遠い星のよそ者について話をするだけで震え上がるはず。なのにこれはなんだ？モン＝ケイが悪夢に出てくる生物の姿をまねることで夜も安心して眠れるようにする、身を守るまじないみたいなものか？」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特瞥了一眼最近的笼子，皱起眉头，露出困惑的表情。{/n}“据我所知，你的族人一提到自遥远群星时的外来者时，就会吓得瑟瑟发抖，外界人。不过，这又是怎么回事？是某种类似于保护仪式的东西吗？猴子们伪装成噩梦中的怪物，这样晚上就能睡个安稳觉了吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特瞥了一眼最近的笼子，皱起眉头，露出困惑的表情。{/n}“据我所知，你的族人一提到自遥远群星时的外来者时，就会吓得瑟瑟发抖，外界人。不过，这又是怎么回事？是某种类似于保护仪式的东西吗？猴子们伪装成噩梦中的怪物，这样晚上就能睡个安稳觉了吗？”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, mirando a las jaulas más cercanas, frunce el ceño con expresión desconcertada.{/n} «Me consta que su especie tiembla en cuanto se menciona a forasteros de estrellas lejanas, elantach. Pero ¿qué es esto? ¿Un ritual de protección en el que los mon-keigh adoptan la apariencia de las criaturas de sus pesadillas para dormir mejor por las noches?».
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, mirando a las jaulas más cercanas, frunce el ceño con expresión desconcertada.{/n} «Me consta que su especie tiembla en cuanto se menciona a forasteros de estrellas lejanas, elantach. Pero ¿qué es esto? ¿Un ritual de protección en el que los mon-keigh adoptan la apariencia de las criaturas de sus pesadillas para dormir mejor por las noches?».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet jette un coup d'œil aux cages à proximité et fronce les sourcils, l'air perplexe.{/n} « Je sais que vos semblables tremblent à la simple mention d'étrangers venus des étoiles lointaines, elantach, mais qu'est-ce que tout ceci ? Une sorte de rituel de protection où des mon-keigh se travestissent afin de ressembler aux créatures qui les effraient, permettant ainsi d'extérioriser leurs angoisses ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet jette un coup d'œil aux cages à proximité et fronce les sourcils, l'air perplexe.{/n} « Je sais que vos semblables tremblent à la simple mention d'étrangers venus des étoiles lointaines, elantach, mais qu'est-ce que tout ceci ? Une sorte de rituel de protection où des mon-keigh se travestissent afin de ressembler aux créatures qui les effraient, permettant ainsi d'extérioriser leurs angoisses ? »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet betrachtet die nächststehenden Käfige und verzieht verwirrt das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich weiß, dass die Euren schon bei der geringsten Erwähnung von Fremden von entfernten Sternen erzittern, Elantach. Aber was ist das hier? Eine Art Schutzritual, bei dem Chem-Pan-Sey sich als Kreaturen aus ihren Albträumen verkleiden, um nachts besser schlafen zu können?"
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet betrachtet die nächststehenden Käfige und verzieht verwirrt das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich weiß, dass die Euren schon bei der geringsten Erwähnung von Fremden von entfernten Sternen erzittern, Elantach. Aber was ist das hier? Eine Art Schutzritual, bei dem Chem-Pan-Sey sich als Kreaturen aus ihren Albträumen verkleiden, um nachts besser schlafen zu können?"

languages.text: {n}En yakın kafeslere bakış atan Yrliet, kafası karışık bir ifadeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Türünün uzak yıldızlardan gelen yabancıların lafı geçtiği an tir tir titremeye başladığını biliyordum da elantach, bu neyin nesi? Mon-keighlerin gece daha rahat uyuyabilmek için kâbuslarındaki yaratıkların kılığına girdiği koruyucu ayin gibi bir şey mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Glancing at the nearest cages, Yrliet frowns, her expression puzzled.{/n} "It is known to me that your kin tremble at the mere mention of outsiders from distant stars, elantach. But what is this? A protection ritual of sorts, where mon-keigh take on the guises of the creatures from their nightmares so that they can sleep better at night?"

traits.locale_text: {n}En yakınlarındaki kafeslere bakan Yrliet, kafası karışık bir ifadeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Türünün uzak yıldızlardan gelen yabancıların lafı geçtiği an tir tir titremeye başladığını zaten biliyordum elantach ama bu da nesi? Mon-keigh'in gece daha rahat uyuyabilmek için kâbuslarındaki yaratıkların kılığına girdiği koruyucu bir ayin gibi bir şey mi?"
